quote: The power of thought is the light of knowledge, the power of will is the energy of character, the power of heart is love. Reason, love and power of will are perfections of man.
author: Ludwig Feuerbach,  The Essence of Christianity

quote: The mind uses the power of thought to win the world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Thoughts are one of the most creative powers we have as human beings. If you hold the mantra in your mind that you are continually becoming more healthful and radiant, that is what you will become.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: The power of human thought grows exponentially with the number of minds that share that thought.
author: Dan Brown,  The Lost Symbol

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: Except our own thoughts, there is nothing absolutely in our power.
author: René Descartes

quote: Your thoughts carry you wherever you want to go. Weak thoughts don’t have the energy to carry you far!
author: Israelmore Ayivor,  Leaders' Watchwords

quote: Thoughts do more. Words to much. Actions do much more.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Thoughts become things. If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand.
author: Bob Proctor,  You Were Born Rich

quote: It is the power of the mind to be unconquerable.
author: Seneca,  The Stoic Philosophy of Seneca: Essays and Letters

quote: I try to avoid having thoughts. They lead to other thoughts, and—if you’re not careful—those lead to actions. Actions make you tired. I have this on rather good authority from someone who once read it in a book.
author: Brandon Sanderson

quote: You are born with the power to change your life by simply changing your thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A soul gives power to the mind; and the mind empowers the soul
author: Jeremy Aldana

quote: Your thoughts make what happen in your life~You can turn anything negative into the positive~What you visualize can come true and you attract it to yourself
author: Pattimari Sheets-Diamond

quote: Power-lust is a weed that grows only in the vacant lots of an abandoned mind.
author: Ayn Rand,  Atlas Shrugged

quote: Thoughts Become Things... Choose The Good Ones!
author: Mike Dooley

quote: The disempowered mind believes dreams come true; the empowered mind knows you bring your dreams to life.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Believe there is a great power silently working all things for good, behave yourself and never mind the rest.
author: Beatrix Potter

quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quote: The thoughts of all men arise from the darkness. If you are the movement of your soul, and the cause of that movement precedes you, then how could you ever call your thoughts your own? How could you be anything other than a slave to the darkness that comes before?
author: R. Scott Bakker,  The Darkness That Comes Before

quote: The first duty of a man is to think for himself
author: José Martí

quote: Original Thoughts [10w] Original thoughts are not diminished by days, distance or disregard.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Thoughts are as simple as the process…a message from the soul; conveyed through the heart; received in the mind
author: Jeremy Aldana

quote: Philosophers have often held disputeAs to the seat of thought in man and bruteFor that the power of thought attends the latterMy friend, thy beau, hath made a settled matter,And spite of dogmas current in all ages,One settled fact is better than ten sages. (O,Tempora! O,Mores!)
author: Edgar Allan Poe,  The Complete Stories and Poems

quote: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: A thinker can truly think only when there is true freedom of thought.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: My task, which I am trying to achieve is, by the power of the written word, to make you hear, to make you feel--it is, before all, to make you see.
author: Joseph Conrad,  Lord Jim

quote: All truly wise thoughts have been thought already thousands of times; but to make them truly ours, we must think them over again honestly, until they take root in our personal experience.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: If you know the power of your thoughts, you would never fear failure.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Without desires and dreams, your thoughts do not matter and you can think whatever you want to.
author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: If you start identifying your inner self with the spirit of pure potentiality then you are aligning with the power that helps in the manifestation of all energy in the form of matter.
author: Stephen Richards,  Be First: Achieve Every Dream

quote: Thought must be divided against itself before it can come to any knowledge of itself.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: I think to think. Not to be thought-full, or to reach a point of wisdom or acquire a grace of knowledge. I think for the sensuality of thought.
author: Ilyas Kassam

quote: Only positive thoughts can inspire you to positive actions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Recognizing power in another does not diminish your own.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: Powerful words harmonize heart and mind as if a symphony.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

quote: Your thoughts are magnets. You attract what you think, and it becomes your reality.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Words do not express thoughts very well. They always become a little different immediately after they are expressed, a little distorted, a little foolish.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: A Controlled Mind Can Create All That It Words...!
author: Sujit Lalwani,  Life Simplified!

quote: Any ideas, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The mind is a powerful thing. It can take you through walls.
author: Denis Avey,  The Man Who Broke Into Auschwitz: A True Story of World War II

quote: Don't believe everything you think. Thoughts are just that - thoughts.
author: Allan Lokos,  Pocket Peace: Effective Practices for Enlightened Living

quote: You don’t have to stay trapped in your thoughts just because you think them.
author: Doug Dillon

quote: Dwell on your own sacred thoughts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We must think beyond ourselves
author: Kevin J. Anderson,  A Forest of Stars

quote: Believing in negative thoughts is the single greatest obstruction to success.
author: Charles F. Glassman,  Brain Drain The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: It is more than probable that I am not understood; but I fear, indeed, that it is in no manner possible to convey to the mind of the merely general reader, an adequate idea of that nervous intensity of interest with which, in my case, the powers of meditation (not to speak technically) busied and buried themselves, in the contemplation of even the most ordinary objects of the universe.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: High thoughts must have high language.
author: Aristophanes,  Frogs and Other Plays

quote: A book without words is a mind without thought.
author: Catherine Forbes
